title: September Lunch Menu
lunchCost: PreK-5 = $2.65, Grades 6-8 = $2.75, Extra entree = $0.75, Milk is $0.40, Adult = $3.50

lunches.lunch: Chicken Parmesan, Sandwich, Chex Mix, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: Don’t let what you can’t do stop you from doing what you can do.

lunches.lunch: It's labor day weekend.  No School!
It's labor day weekend.  No School!
French Toast Sticks, Sausage Links, Juice,Veggies & Dip
lunches.comment: The more you give away the more happy you become.

lunches.lunch: Pasta with Meat Sauce, Breadstick, Salad, Fruit
lunches.comment: Hey, meatsauce, you should really take hot lunch.

lunches.lunch: Turkey Sub, Lettuce Cup, Sun Chips Fruit
lunches.comment: What the heck is a lettuce cup?

lunches.lunch: Cheese Pizza, Animal Crackers, Fruit, Veggies & Dip
lunches.comment: I think I can. I know I can.

lunches.lunch: Sloppy Joes, Baked Chips, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: It’s not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.

lunches.lunch: Meatball Sub, Baked Chips, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: No one is perfect – that’s why pencils have erasers.

lunches.lunch: Chicken Noodle Soup & Crackers, Turkey Sandwich, and Fruit
lunches.comment: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem and smarter than you think.

lunches.lunch: Corn Dog, Baked Beans, Veggies & Dip, Fruit
lunches.comment: Beans Beans, the musical fruit, the more you eat the more you toot, the more you toot, the better you feel, so lets have beans for every meal.

lunches.lunch: Early release that day, you'll have to make your own lunch
lunches.comment: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you’ll go.

lunches.lunch: Chicken Patty on a bun, Pretzels, Veggie and Fruit
lunches.comment: Be yourself. Everyone else is already taken.

lunches.lunch: Pancakes, Sausage Links, Juice, Veggies & Dip
lunches.comment: Try not. Do or do not, there is no try.

lunches.lunch: Beef Nachos with Meat & Cheese, Lettuce Cup, Spanish Rice, Fruit
lunches.comment: Seriously, I still do not know what a lettuce cup is.

lunches.lunch: Hot dog on a bun, Pretzels, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: You become what you believe.

lunches.lunch: Bagels with Cream Cheese and Jelly, Cheese Stick, Veggies & Dip, Orange Juice
lunches.comment: Attitude is a little thing that makes a Big difference.

lunches.lunch: Hamburger on a bun, French Fries, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: If you can dream it, you can do it.

lunches.lunch: Chili, Ceasar Salad, Cornbread, Fruit
lunches.comment: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.

lunches.lunch: Lasagna with Meat Sauce, Breadstick, Salad Fruit
lunches.comment: Hey meatsauce.

lunches.lunch: Sweet & Sour Chicken with Rice, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: People will love you.  People will hate you.  And none of it will have anything to do with you.

lunches.lunch: Cheese Bread with Marinara Sauce, Salad, Fruit
lunches.comment: Take a second to think about how blessed you are.
